title: ‘Bridgerton’ Season 2 Episodes 1-4
description:
Juliet and Jodi talk about all the drama and romance that has unfolded through Season 2, Episode 4 of ‘Bridgerton,' including Anthony Bridgerton’s complicated relationship with the Sharma sisters, the central mystery surrounding Lady Whistledown’s identity, and much more.
Hosts: Juliet Litman and Jodi Walker
Producer: Sasha Ashall
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
